b: I'm glad I could help you, have a nice day!
apld:
If you're using Apple AirPort and want to use it in DHCP mode with Cujo, you can follow these setup instructions: 
 https://support.getcujo.com/support/solutions/articles/9000092004-dhcp-mode-apple-airport
aplb:
If you're using Apple AirPort and want to use it in Bridge mode with Cujo as an Access point, you can follow these setup instructions: 
 https://support.getcujo.com/support/solutions/articles/9000091993-router-as-access-point-apple-airport
